General.Name: Fesh Fash Snack Food Production Co
General.Description: Fesh Fash Snack Food Production Company produces and sells food snacks. The company offers corn puffs under the Fish Fash, Cooorah, and Mini Cooorah brands; potato chips under the Zizo, Fish Fash Chips, and Mini Sticks brand names; and potato pellets under the Garameesh brand. It also engages in the marketing food products, wholesale and retail trade, buying and selling of agricultural corps, storage activities, food preservation and packaging, and invests in industrial projects, as well as establishes and operates warehouses. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

3.Name: Mr. Faisal Hamad Al-Humaid
3.Title: Deputy Chairman - Non Exec. Board Director
